name: Beard Bar
description:
More than just a Beard Wash!

This old fashioned Beard Bar is a beard shampoo and beard conditioner in one. Just a small amount of this special soap lathers up thick and has a natural mild scent of lemon, lavender and thyme. Thoroughly cleans and deeply conditions your beard using organic oils. Leaves your beard feeling soft, clean and manageable. For extra conditioning and control follow up with our leave in conditioners.

● Long Lasting
● Mild Manly Scent
● Cleans and Conditions 

To Use: Rub beard bar across hands only a few times. Rub hands together to create lather. Work soap into mustache and beard running fingers through beard hairs all the way down to the follicle. Let this bars natural oils soak in before rinsing thoroughly.

name: Beard Conditioner
description:
The Original leave-in organic conditioner for your beard or scruff. Soften rough hair, moisturize dry skin, protect and nourish your beard even in the harshest of climates.  Keep your beard growing thick, clean and soft with this deep conditioning blend. 

● 100% Fragrance Free

● 100% Organic Ingredients 

● Encourages beard hair to grow stronger and thicker 

- To Use -
Place a small amount of this special conditioner in the palm of your hand and rub hands together until product has completely liquified. Apply conditioner evenly to a dry beard or after washing to lock in even more moisture.

name: Beard Oil
description:
The Original unscented beard oil conditions and moisturizes your beard leaving it clean, soft and non-greasy. This historically celebrated blend of organic oils is easy to absorb, deep conditioning and wonderfully nourishing. Regular use of this formula lends softness and improves overall manageability. 

● 100 % Fragrance Free

● 100 % Organic Ingredients

● Revitalize, Control & Condition

To Use: Massage a few drops of this beard oil into a dry beard or apply right after washing and drying to lock in even more moisture.

name: Fir Needle Beard Oil
description:
The manly and uplifting aroma of this Fir Needle Beard Oil refreshes your beard while it increases manageability. This organic beard oil moisturizes and conditions your beard leaving it clean, soft and smelling great. Regular use of this formula lends softness and control.

● 100 % Organic Ingredients

● Revitalize, Control & Condition

● Conditions and refreshes as it increases manageability

To Use: Massage a few drops of this beard oil into a dry beard or apply right after washing and drying to lock in even more moisture.

name: Lavender Beard Oil
description:
This lavender beard oil has a refreshing and distinct aroma that can melt away nervous exhaustion and restlessness. The herb Lavender has been used since ancient times to promote healthy skin and hair growth. This fragrant beard oil conditions and moisturizes your beard leaving it clean, soft and smelling great. This historically celebrated blend of organic oils is easy to absorb, deep conditioning and extra nourishing. Regular use of this formula lends a wonderful softness and improves overall manageability.

● 100 % Organic Ingredients

● Revitalize, Control & Condition

● Conditions and refreshes as it increases manageability

To Use: Massage a few drops of this beard oil into a dry beard or apply right after washing and drying to lock in even more moisture.  

Size - 1 fluid ounce
